title: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Extreme Gen 5: Release date, specs, and everything you need to know
content:
At this year’s MWC, Lenovo introduced the latest iteration of the ThinkPad X1 Extreme, which is now up to Gen 5. This is one of Lenovo’s best ThinkPads, geared towards business professionals who need top-tier performance for things like 3D rendering and video editing. It’s also great if you want a machine that can do

The post Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Extreme Gen 5: Release date, specs, and everything you need to know appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Lenovo's latest business powerhouse, the ThinkPad X1 Extreme Gen 5, is coming soon, and we've rounded up everything you need to know.
